Author: Stephenie Meyer,  Eclipse
Quote: He's like a drug for you, Bella.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Glass
Quote: There is no pretending,"Jace said with absolute clarity. "I love you, and I will love you until I die, and if there is life after that, I'll love you then.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  The Intern
Quote: When someone loves you, the way they talk about you is different. You feel safe and comfortable.

Author: George Jean Nathan
Quote: Love is an emotion experienced by the many and enjoyed by the few.

Author: Lisa Kleypas,  Blue-Eyed Devil
Quote: I no longer believed in the idea of soul mates, or love at first sight. But I was beginning to believe that a very few times in your life, if you were lucky, you might meet someone who was exactly right for you. Not because he was perfect, or because you were, but because your combined flaws were arranged in a way that allowed two separate beings to hinge together.

Author: Richelle Mead,  Frostbite
Quote: You can't force love, I realized. It's there or it isn't. If it's not there, you've got to be able to admit it. If it is there, you've got to do whatever it takes to protect the ones you love.

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more, that plants a fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds. And that's what you've given me. That's what I'd hoped to give you forever

Author: Lady Gaga
Quote: Some women choose to follow men, and some women choose to follow their dreams. If you're wondering which way to go, remember that your career will never wake up and tell you that it doesn't love you anymore.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Glass
Quote: And I'm suppose to sit by while you date boys and fall in love with someone else, get married...?"His voice tightened. "And meanwhile, I'll die a little bit more every day, watching.

Author: Shana Abe
Quote: I heard what you said. I’m not the silly romantic you think. I don’t want the heavens or the shooting stars. I don’t want gemstones or gold. I have those things already. I want…a steady hand. A kind soul. I want to fall asleep, and wake, knowing my heart is safe. I want to love, and be loved.

Author: Torquato Tasso
Quote: Any time not spent on love is wasted.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook
Quote: They didn’t agree on much. In fact, they didn’t agree on anything. They fought all the time and challenged each other ever day. But despite their differences, they had one important thing in common. They were crazy about each other.

Author: Oscar Wilde,  The Importance of Being Earnest and Other Plays
Quote: The very essence of romance is uncertainty.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games
Quote: I can feel Peeta press his forehead into my temple and he asks, 'So now that you've got me, what are you going to do with me?' I turn into him. 'Put you somewhere you can't get hurt.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Twelfth Night
Quote: If music be the food of love, play on,Give me excess of it; that surfeiting,The appetite may sicken, and so die.

Author: Richelle Mead,  Vampire Academy
Quote: Only a true best friend can protect you from your immortal enemies.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Message in a Bottle
Quote: True love is rare, and it's the only thing that gives life real meaning.

Author: Pedro Calderón de la Barca
Quote: When love is not madness it is not love.

Author: Kahlil Gibran
Quote: If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. If they don't, they never were.

Author: Santosh Kalwar,  Quote Me Everyday
Quote: I was smiling yesterday,I am smiling today and I will smile tomorrow.Simply because life is too short to cry for anything.

Author: Jane Austen,  Pride and Prejudice
Quote: I cannot fix on the hour, or the spot, or the look or the words, which laid the foundation. It is too long ago. I was in the middle before I knew that I had begun.

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Hush, Hush
Quote: Say 'provoking' again. Your mouth looks provocative when you do.

Author: E.M. Forster,  A Room with a View
Quote: It isn't possible to love and part. You will wish that it was. You can transmute love, ignore it, muddle it, but you can never pull it out of you. I know by experience that the poets are right: love is eternal.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  It Occurred to Me
Quote: If loving someone is putting them in a straitjacket and kicking them down a flight of stairs, then yes, I have loved a few people.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games
Quote: You here to finish me off, Sweetheart?

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook
Quote: Every great love starts with a great story...

Author: Charles Dickens
Quote: Never close your lips to those whom you have already opened your heart.

Author: Diana Gabaldon,  Dragonfly in Amber
Quote: I stood still, vision blurring, and in that moment, I heard my heart break. It was a small, clean sound, like the snapping of a flower's stem.

Author: J.R.R. Tolkien
Quote: And he took her in his arms and kissed her under the sunlit sky, and he cared not that they stood high upon the walls in the sight of many.

Author: Albert Camus,  The Fall
Quote: You know what charm is: a way of getting the answer yes without having asked any clear question.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Ashes
Quote: You could have fooled me. Everytime I called you, Luke said you were sick. I figured you were avoiding me. Again.""I wasn't. I did want to talk to you. I've been thinking about you all the time.""I've been thinking about you, too.""I really was sick. I swear. I almost died back there on the ship, you know.""I know. Everytime you almost die, I almost die myself.

Author: Jude Deveraux,  A Knight in Shining Armor
Quote: My soul will find yours.

Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  This Side of Paradise
Quote: I'm not sentimental--I'm as romantic as you are. The idea, you know,is that the sentimental person thinks things will last--the romanticperson has a desperate confidence that they won't.

Author: E.L. James,  Fifty Shades of Grey
Quote: Sometimes I wonder if there's something wrong with me. Perhaps I've spent too long in the company of my literary romantic heroes, and consequently my ideals and expectations are far too high.

Author: Simone Elkeles,  Rules of Attraction
Quote: You’re dangerous,” he says.“Why?”“Because you make me believe in the impossible

Author: Jane Austen,  Love and Friendship
Quote: The Very first moment I beheld him, my heart was irrevocably gone.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  It Occurred to Me
Quote: The mouth is made for communication, and nothing is more articulate than a kiss.

Author: Julio Cortázar
Quote: Come sleep with me: We won't make Love,Love will make us.

Author: Fannie Flagg,  Fried Green Tomatoes at the Whistle Stop Cafe
Quote: I wonder how many people don't get the one they want, but end up with the one they're supposed to be with.

Author: William Shakespeare
Quote: My only love sprung from my only hate!Too early seen unknown, and known too late!Prodigious birth of love it is to me,That I must love a loathed enemy.

Author: Stephanie Lennox,  I Don't Remember You
Quote: I’ve been fighting to be who I am all my life. What’s the point of being who I am, if I can’t have the person who was worth all the fighting for?

Author: Suzanne Collins,  Mockingjay
Quote: Sometimes when I'm alone, I take the pearl from where it lives in my pocket and try to remember the boy with the bread, the strong arms that warded off nightmares on the train, the kisses in the arena.

Author: Elinor Glyn
Quote: Romance is the glamour which turns the dust of everyday life into a golden haze.

Author: Greg Behrendt
Quote: I'm about to make a wild, extreme and severe relationship rule: the word busy is a load of crap and is most often used by assholes. The word "busy"is the relationship Weapon of Mass Destruction. It seems like a good excuse, but in fact in every silo you uncover, all you're going to find is a man who didn't care enough to call. Remember men are never to busy to get what they want.

Author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray
Quote: When one is in love, one always begins by deceiving one's self, and one always ends by deceiving others. That is what the world calls a romance.

Author: Richelle Mead,  Succubus Blues
Quote: Sometimes you wake up from a dream. Sometimes you wake up in a dream. And sometimes, every once in a while, you wake up in someone else's dream.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Dear John
Quote: In our time together, you claimed a special place in my heart, one I'll carry with me forever and that no one can ever replace.

Author: Charlotte Brontë,  Jane Eyre
Quote: I am not an angel,' I asserted; 'and I will not be one till I die: I will be myself. Mr. Rochester, you must neither expect nor exact anything celestial of me - for you will not get it, any more than I shall get it of you: which I do not at all anticipate.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Romeo and Juliet
Quote: thus with a kiss I die

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: Romance is thinking about your significant other, when you are supposed to be thinking about something else.

Author: Jamie McGuire,  Beautiful Disaster
Quote: I belong to my beloved, and my beloved is mine.

Author: Meg Cabot,  Princess in Training
Quote: The fact is, I love him. He's the boy I want and one day he'll be MINE.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook
Quote: She wanted something else, something different, something more. Passion and romance, perhaps, or maybe quiet conversations in candlelit rooms, or perhaps something as simple as not being second.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This is the best book I've ever written, and it still sucks
Quote: With my last breath, I’ll exhale my love for you. I hope it’s a cold day, so you can see what you meant to me.

Author: Jenny Han,  The Summer I Turned Pretty
Quote: Moments, when lost, can't be found again. They're just gone.

Author: Rachel Cohn,  Naomi and Ely's No Kiss List
Quote: It's bullshit to think of friendship and romance as being different. They're not. They're just variations of the same love. Variations of the same desire to be close.

Author: Randy Pausch,  The Last Lecture
Quote: When it comes to men who are romantically interested in you, it’s really simple. Just ignore everything they say and only pay attention to what they do.

Author: Tessa Dare,  A Lady of Persuasion
Quote: Oh no. Don't smile. You'll kill me. I stop breathing when you smile.

Author: Kathleen Tessaro
Quote: If you can capture a woman's imagination, then you will have her. But imagination is a strange creature. It needs time and distance to function properly.

Author: Charlaine Harris,  Club Dead
Quote: You are speaking of my future lover. Be more respectful.

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: You really love her don't you,"she said.With all my heart."She looked as sad as I'd ever seen her.What's your heart telling you to do?"I don't know."Maybe", she said gently,"You're trying to hard to hear it.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  The Intern
Quote: Those sweet lips. My, oh my, I could kiss those lips all night long.Good things come to those who wait.

Author: Mario Vargas Llosa,  Aunt Julia and the Scriptwriter
Quote: One can't fight with oneself, for this battle has only one loser.

Author: Stephenie Meyer,  Eclipse
Quote: He sighed. "The clouds I can handle. But I can't fight with an eclipse.

Author: E.L. James,  Fifty Shades Darker
Quote: You wanted hearts and flowers,” he murmurs.I blink at him, not quite believing what I’m seeing.“You have my heart.” And he waves toward the room.“And here are the flowers,” I whisper, completing his sentence. “Christian, it’s lovely.

Author: Nora Roberts,  The Stanislaski Brothers: Mikhail and Alex
Quote: Damn me to hell or take me to heaven, but for Gods sake, do it now....

Author: Stephenie Meyer,  New Moon
Quote: I honestly have no idea how to live without you.

Author: Jeaniene Frost
Quote: If I die, I will wait for you, do you understand? No matter how long. I will watch from beyond to make sure you live every year you have to its fullest, and then we’ll have so much to talk about when I see you again… (Bones)

Author: E.L. James,  Fifty Shades of Grey
Quote: Don't get your panties in such a twist... and give me back mine.

Author: Amy Sedaris,  I Like You: Hospitality Under the Influence
Quote: Don't leave a piece of jewelry at his house so you can go back and get it later; he may be with his real girlfriend.

Author: Charlie Huston,  Already Dead
Quote: One day, when I am a braver man, I will tell her these things, and then I will look her in the eye tell her I love her and ask her to be only mine. But until that day, we're just friends.

Author: Julia Quinn
Quote: You always get more respect when you don't have a happy ending.

Author: Greg Behrendt,  He's Just Not That Into You: The No-Excuses Truth to Understanding Guys
Quote: Here's something else to think about: calling when you say you're going to is the very first brick in the house you are building of love and trust. If he can't lay this one stupid brick down, you ain't never gonna have a house baby, and it's cold outside.

Author: E.A. Bucchianeri,  Brushstrokes of a Gadfly
Quote: So it’s true, when all is said and done, grief is the price we pay for love.

Author: Colleen Houck
Quote: Falling for him would be like cliff diving. It would be either the most exhilarating thing that ever happened to me or the stupidest mistake I’d ever make.

Author: Janet Evanovich
Quote: Romance novels are birthday cake and life is often peanut butter and jelly. I think everyone should have lots of delicious romance novels lying around for those times when the peanut butter of life gets stuck to the roof of your mouth.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Romeo and Juliet
Quote: For never was a story of more woe than this of Juliet and her Romeo.

Author: Simone Elkeles,  Rules of Attraction
Quote: We kiss all the time."I clear my throat, then add, "We just...do it in private.""A smug expression crosses his face. "I don't buy it for a second, 'cause if you were my girlfriend and a stud like me was livin' in your house, I'd kiss you in front of the guy every chance I got as a reminder.""A reminder of w-w-what?""That you were mine.

Author: Jane Austen,  Pride and Prejudice
Quote: We all know him to be a proud, unpleasant sort of man; but this would be nothing if you really liked him.

Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote: If a man wants you, nothing can keep him away. If he doesn't want you, nothing can make him stay.

Author: Laini Taylor,  Daughter of Smoke & Bone
Quote: Love is a luxury.""No. Love is an element."An element. Like air to breathe, earth to stand on.

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: I'd love to, she finally said,"on one condition."I steadied myself, hoping it wasn't something too awful."Yes?""You have to promise that you won't fall in love with me."I knew she was kidding me by the way she laughed, and I couldn't help but breathe a sigh of relief.Sometimes, I had to admit, Jamie had a pretty good sense of humor.I smiled and gave her my word.

Author: Diana Gabaldon,  Outlander
Quote: Oh, aye, Sassenach. I am your master . . . and you're mine. Seems I canna possess your soul without losing my own.

Author: John Green
Quote: Nerd girls are the world’s most underutilized romantic resource. And guys, do not tell me that nerd girls are not hot because that shows a Paris Hilton-esque failure to understand hotness.

Author: Diana Gabaldon,  Outlander
Quote: Ye are Blood of my Blood, and Bone of my Bone,I give ye my Body, that we Two might be One.I give ye my Spirit, 'til our Life shall be Done.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: Never rearrange your life in order to meet Mr. Darcy half way. If he couldn’t see your worth at the moment you met then he won’t two years later. May the halls of Pemberly be filled with his regrets and your life filled with thankfulness because of this revelation.

Author: J.D. Robb,  Innocent in Death
Quote: No. No, I don't believe you'd betray me with her. I don't believe you'd cheat on me. But I'm afraid, and I'm sick in my heart that you might look at her, then at me. And regret.

Author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Pure
Quote: Ever since I’ve met you, I’ve wanted to break every rule.” Aiden turned away, the muscles in his neck tensing. He sighed. “You’ll become the centre of someone’s world one day. And he’ll be the luckiest son of a bitch on this earth.

Author: Richelle Mead,  Vampire Academy
Quote: If I let myself love you, I won't throw myself in front of her. I'll throw myself in front of you.

Author: Jeaniene Frost,  Halfway to the Grave
Quote: Don't kiss me like a woman if you're going to treat me like a child.

Author: Groucho Marx
Quote: Some people claim that marriage interferes with romance. There's no doubt about it. Anytime you have a romance, your wife is bound to interfere.

Author: Laurell K. Hamilton
Quote: Only love of a good woman will make a man question every choice, every action. Only love makes a warrior hesitate for fear that his lady will find him cruel. Only love makes a man both the best he will ever be, and the weakest. Sometimes all in the same moment. -Wicked

Author: Jarod Kintz,  It Occurred to Me
Quote: I used to date the lead singer of The Cranberries, but she cheated on me. Turns out she had some turkey on the side.

Author: Stephanie Laurens,  The Edge of Desire
Quote: My heart only ever had one thought, one want. One need. Despite all, in spite of all...All my heart has ever wanted is you.

Author: Linda Howard,  After the Night
Quote: Do you want to know why men name their penis? So the most important decisions in their life aren't made by a stranger.

Author: Kelley Armstrong,  The Reckoning
Quote: You were just worried about me."An exhale, relieved that I had understood. "Yeah"I turned. "Because you think I'm worth it"He put his fingers under my chin. "I absolutely think your worth it.""But you don't think you are."His mouth opened. Shut."That's what this is about, Derek. You won't let us worry about you because you don't think you're worth it. But I do. I absolutely do.

Author: L.J. Smith,  Nightfall
Quote: Why do people always assume that volume will succeed when logic won’t? - Damon

Author: Colleen Houck
Quote: You don’t take away my choices. You are my choice.

Author: Rowena Cherry,  Knight's Fork
Quote: Carpe Scrotum. Seize life by the testicles

Author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower
Quote: What about when someone doesn't need a shoulder? What if they need the arms?

Author: Greg Behrendt,  He's Just Not That Into You: The No-Excuses Truth to Understanding Guys
Quote: You picked a lemon, throw it away lemonade is overrated. Freaks should remain at the circus, not in your apartment. You already have one asshole. You don’t need another. Make a space in your life for the glorious things you deserve. Have faith.

Author: Cecelia Ahern
Quote: Memories were fine but you couldn't touch them, smell them or hold them. They were never exactly as the moment was, and they faded with time.

Author: W. Somerset Maugham,  Of Human Bondage
Quote: He did not care if she was heartless, vicious and vulgar, stupid and grasping, he loved her. He would rather have misery with one than happiness with the other.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  Wicked Lovely
Quote: I felt like an animal, and animals don’t know sin, do they?

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Keeping Faith
Quote: I don't think we get a choice in who we fall for,"Ian whispers. "I think we just do.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Attachments
Quote: Every woman wants a man who'll fall in love with her soul as well as her body.

Author: Cecelia Ahern,  P.S. I Love You
Quote: what a luxury it was for people to hold their loved ones whenever they wanted

Author: Lauren Kate,  Passion
Quote: What if you find your soul mate... at the wrong time?

Author: Augustine of Hippo
Quote: To fall in love with God is the greatest romance; to seek him the greatest adventure; to find him, the greatest human achievement.

Author: Deborah Cox
Quote: So I placed my heart under lock and key To take some time, and take care of me But I turn around and you're standing here

Author: Scott Dikkers,  You Are Worthless: Depressing Nuggets of Wisdom Sure to Ruin Your Day
Quote: Statistically speaking, there is a 65 percent chance that the love of your life is having an affair. Be very suspicious.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  Mockingjay
Quote: Stay with me.Always.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  EyeLeash: A Blog Novel
Quote: V-Day…if you need this one day in a year to show everyone else you truly care for “your loved one” I think it’s quite stupid. I hate this commercialism. It’s all artificial, and has nothing to do with real love.

Author: Michelle Hodkin,  The Unbecoming of Mara Dyer
Quote: You're supposed to say, 'All I want is your happiness. I'll do whatever it takes, even if it means being without you.'""Sorry,"Noah said. "I'm just not that big of a person.

Author: أحلام مستغانمي,  الأسود يليق بك
Quote: لن يعترف حتى لنفسه بأنه خسرها. سيدّعي أنها من خسرته، وأنه من أراد لهما فراقًا قاطعًا كضربة سيف، فهو يفضّل على حضورها غيابًا طويلًا، وعلى المتع الصغيرة ألمًا كبيرًا، وعلى الانقطاع المتكرر قطيعة حاسمة.

Author: Stephanie Laurens,  A Rogue's Proposal
Quote: Just because I'm not forever by your side doesn't mean that's not precisely where I want to be.

Author: Jeanette Winterson,  Oranges Are Not the Only Fruit
Quote: I seem to have run in a great circle, and met myself again on the starting line.

Author: Colleen Houck,  Tiger's Curse
Quote: The fact is…I’m in love with you, and I have been for some time.

Author: Danielle Steel,  No Greater Love
Quote: Things work out the way they're meant to

Author: Erin Morgenstern,  The Night Circus
Quote: I have tried to let you go and I cannot. I cannot stop thinking of you. I cannot stop dreaming about you.

Author: Mark Green
Quote: Live like you were dying, Love because you are.

Author: Lauren Oliver,  Delirium
Quote: He is my world and my world is him and without him there is no world.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Dear John
Quote: You're a hero and a gentleman, you're kind and honest, but more than that, you're the first man I ever truly loved. And no matter what the future brings, you always will be, and I know that my life is better for it.

Author: Richelle Mead,  Vampire Academy
Quote: I get in that kind of situation all the time, Comrade. It's not a big deal."Anger replaced my fear. I didn't like being treated like a child. "Stop calling me that. You don't even know what you're talking about.""Sure I do. I had to do a report on the R.S.S.R. last year.

Author: P.C. Cast,  Untamed
Quote: Because you are the superhero fledgling. I’m just your more attractive sidekick. Oh, and the herd of nerds are your dorky minions.

Author: Jocelyn Soriano,  Mend My Broken Heart
Quote: To be rejected by someone doesn't mean you should also reject yourself or that you should think of yourself as a lesser person. It doesn't mean that nobody will ever love you anymore. Remember that only ONE person has rejected you at the moment, and it only hurt so much because to you, that person's opinion symbolized the opinion of the whole world, of God.

Author: Erich Maria Remarque,  Three Comrades
Quote: It's only terrible to have nothing to wait for.

Author: Jane Austen,  Pride and Prejudice
Quote: Oh, Lizzy! do anything rather than marry without affection.

Author: Dorothy Parker
Quote: I require three things in a man: he must be handsome, ruthless, and stupid.

Author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray
Quote: She is all the great heroines of the world in one. She is more than an individual. I love her, and I must make her love me. I want to make Romeo jealous. I want the dead lovers of the world to hear our laughter, and grow sad. I want a breath of our passion to stir dust into consciousness, to wake their ashes into pain.

Author: Adriana Trigiani,  Very Valentine
Quote: That's when you know for sure somebody loves you. They figure out what you need and they give it to you -- without you asking.

Author: Graham Greene,  The Comedians
Quote: Like some wines our love could neither mature nor travel.

Author: Diana Gabaldon,  Dragonfly in Amber
Quote: Blood of my Blood,"he whispered, "and bone of my bone. You carry me within ye, Claire, and ye canna leave me now, no matter what happens, You are mine, always, if ye will it or no, if ye want me or nay. Mine, and I wilna let ye go.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Wedding
Quote: But love, I’ve come to understand, is more than three words mumbled before bedtime. Love is sustained by action, a pattern of devotion in the things we do for each other every day.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Fangirl
Quote: She smiled, and her eyes started to drift downward. "Cather..."Back up to his eyes."You know that I'm falling in love with you, right?

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Eleanor & Park
Quote: The first time he'd held her hand, it felt so good that it crowded out all the bad things. It felt better than anything had ever hurt.

Author: Colleen Houck,  Tiger's Quest
Quote: I decided to find you, throw myself at your feet, and beg you to have mercy on me. Honestly, I’ll accept whatever you choose, Kelsey. Just don’t ask me to live apart from you again. Because...I can’t.

Author: Maggie Stiefvater,  Shiver
Quote: Sam laughed, a funny, self-deprecating laugh. "You did read a lot. And spent too much time just inside the kitchen window, where I couldn't see you very well.""And not enough time mostly naked in front of my bedroom window?"I teased. Sam turned bright red. "That,"he said, "is so not the point of this conversation.

Author: Kim Harrison,  Every Which Way But Dead
Quote: And then there are the rare ones who know love, who understand it. Who freely give of themselves, demanding only a return of that love,that trust.

Author: Jamie McGuire,  Providence
Quote: Time will make it worse! You're...the other half of his soul. He's never going to get over you. And no matter how much you hope that you will... you'll never get over him. You're going to wake up one day and realize what you've done, and you're going to regret the time you wasted apart from him for the rest of your life.

Author: J.R. Ward,  Lover Enshrined
Quote: After a moment, Wrath turned to John. "This is Lassiter, the fallen angel. One of the last times he was here on earth, there was a plague in central Europe-""Okay, that was so not my fault-""-which wiped out two-thirds of the human population.""I'd like to remind you that you don't like humans.""They smell bad when they're dead.""All you mortal types do.

Author: Julie de Lespinasse
Quote: You know that when I hate you, it is because I love you to a point of passion that unhinges my soul.

Author: Laurell K. Hamilton,  A Stroke of Midnight
Quote: Love is too precious to be ashamed of.

Author: E.L. James,  Fifty Shades Darker
Quote: I hug him tightly. “I can’t imagine my life without you, Christian. I love you so much it frightens me.” “Me, too,” he breathes. “My life would be empty without you. I love you so much.

Author: Margaret Atwood
Quote: Romance takes place in the middle distance. Romance is looking in at yourself through a window clouded with dew. Romance means leaving things out: where life grunts and shuffles, romance only sighs.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  A Story That Talks about Talking Is Like Chatter to Chattering Teeth, and Every Set of Dentures Can Attest to the Fact That No..
Quote: I would pour you a glass of wine, but wouldn’t it be more romantic if you sipped it out of my armpit?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I don’t want to make love last, I want to make love second to last. The last thing we’ll do is cuddle.

Author: Colleen Houck
Quote: And yes, I’ll admit, I am jealous. I’m jealous of every minute you spend with him, of every concerned expression you send his way, of every tear shed, of every glance, every touch, and every thought. I want to rip him to pieces and purge him from your mind and from your heart. But I can’t.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Eleanor & Park
Quote: It was the nicest thing she could imagine. It made her want to have his babies and give him both of her kidneys.

Author: Cate Tiernan
Quote: There is darkness in light, there is pain in joy, and there are thorns on the rose.

Author: John Joseph Powell,  The Secret of Staying in Love
Quote: It is an absolute human certainty that no one can know his own beauty or perceive a sense of his own worth until it has been reflected back to him in the mirror of another loving, caring human being.

Author: Natalie Clifford Barney
Quote: When you're in love you never really know whether your elation comes from the qualities of the one you love, or if it attributes them to her; whether the light which surrounds her like a halo comes from you, from her, or from the meeting of your sparks.

Author: E.A. Bucchianeri,  Brushstrokes of a Gadfly
Quote: Falling in love is very real, but I used to shake my head when people talked about soul mates, poor deluded individuals grasping at some supernatural ideal not intended for mortals but sounded pretty in a poetry book. Then, we met, and everything changed, the cynic has become the converted, the sceptic, an ardent zealot.

Author: Julie James,  Practice Makes Perfect

Author: William Shakespeare,  Romeo and Juliet

Author: Neil Strauss
Quote: Attraction is not an option.

Author: Sophie Kinsella,  Can You Keep a Secret?

Author: Jess C. Scott,  EyeLeash: A Blog Novel
Quote: My head’ll explode if I continue with this escapism.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I make love like the 13th floor is the 14th floor of a hotel. I give it that little extra that takes it to a whole new level.

Author: E. Lockhart,  We Were Liars
Quote: He was contemplation and enthusiasm. Ambition and strong coffee. I could have looked at him forever.

Author: Mary M. Ricksen
Quote: Know that love is truly timeless.

Author: Colleen Houck
Quote: Were you always such a stubborn, blind, obtuse girl?”“Are you calling me stupid?”“Yes, but in a more poetic way!”“Well, here’s a poem for you. Get lost!

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love flows like flowers, and grows like water. I’m so thirsty for romance I could drink a dozen roses.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: 0 plus 100 equals 100. But so does 50 plus 50, only with more balance. Let this be a lesson in love.

Author: David Sedaris,  Dress Your Family in Corduroy and Denim

Once, he hit me on the back of the head with a broken wineglass, and I fell to the floor pretending to be unconscious. That was romantic, or would have been had he rushed to my side rather than stepping over my body to fetch the dustpan.

Author: Andrea Gibson

Author: Maggie Stiefvater,  Shiver

Author: Colleen Houck

As a prince, I grant you any boon within my power. As a man, I ask to sit at your feet and worship you. Ask me to do anything for you and I will do it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My brain is divided into two butterflies, and both are in love with your rose-shaped heart. If you've got the garden, I've got my whole life.

Author: Kate Chisman,  Run
Quote: We ruined each other by being together. We destroyed each other’s dreams.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If it’s the last kiss, we’d better make it last. I hope you don’t have anywhere to be, because I have the rest of my life free.

Author: Julie Anne Peters,  Keeping You a Secret

Author: Amanda Grace,  But I Love Him

Author: Megan McCafferty,  Second Helpings
Quote: It's so much easier to convince yourself you're madly in love with someone when you know nothing about him.

Author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower
Quote: I don't want to be somebody's crush. If somebody likes me, I want them to like the real me, not what they think I am.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: She has a sly smile, and eyes that seem to see my essence as they explore my soul and implore my spirit to enter her. I look at her and I see love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ll be your Dostoevsky, if you’ll be my Tolstoy. Our life together will be so full of despair that death will be like a gulag full of joy.

Author: Lisa Kleypas,  Again the Magic
Quote: For thousands of nights I dreamed of making love to you. No man on earth has ever hated sunrise as I do.

Author: Ilana Tan,  Winter in Tokyo
Quote: Kenapa harus takut gelap kalau ada banyak hal indah yang hanya bisa dilihat sewaktu gelap?-Nishimura Kazuto

Author: Colleen Houck,  Tiger's Curse
Quote: His eyes drifted leisurely back up to my face and he smiled at me appreciatively, “Kelsey, when a man spends time with a beautiful woman, he needs to pace himself. I quirked my eyebrow at him and laughed. “Yeah, I’m a regular marathon alright.” He kissed my fingers. “Exactly. A wise man never sprints…in a marathon.

Author: Colleen Houck,  Tiger's Curse
Quote: A girl can still admire, can’t she? Even those who can’t afford to go in the store can still window-shop. Right? Knowing he wasn’t for me didn’t mean I couldn’t covet the merchandise.

Author: Anaïs Nin,  Delta of Venus
Quote: He was now in that state of fire that she loved. She wanted to be burnt.

Author: C.L. Wilson,  Lord of the Fading Lands
Quote: My beloved is the sunAnd I am the earth that thrives only in her warmth. My beloved is the rainAnd I am the grass that thirsts for her quenching kiss. My beloved is the windAnd I am the wings that soar when she fills me with her gentle strength.My beloved is the rockUpon which rests the happiness of all my days.—The Elements of Love, a poem by Aileron v'En Kavali of the Fey

Author: Tim Burton
Quote: We all know interspecies romance is weird.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Dear John
Quote: Believe me, I'm no romantic, and while I've heard all about love at first sight, I've never believed in it, and I still don't. But even so, there was something there, something recognizably real, and I couldn't look away.

Author: Greg Behrendt
Quote: We're taught that in life, we should try to look on the bright side. Not in this case. In this case, assume rejection first. Assume you're the rule, not the exception. It's liberating. But we also know it's not an easy concept. -He's not just into you

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Our love went from fly to flower to butterfly, and it was meant to beautifully flutter, not sit still on a shelf like a trophy to be collected.

Author: Lang Leav,  Love & Misadventure
Quote: Before I fellin love with words,with setting skies and singing birds—it was you I fellin love with first.

Author: Jennifer L. Armentrout,  Obsidian
Quote: I couldn't stop staring at his mouth when he spoke. I bet he knew how to kiss. Perfect kisses too, ones that weren't wet and gross, but the kind that curled toes.I needed to stop looking at him in general.

Author: Veronica Rossi,  Through the Ever Night
Quote: Love is a rebellious bird that nobody can tame.

Author: Jane Austen,  Pride and Prejudice
Quote: Had I been in love, I could not have been more wretchedly blind. But vanity, not love, has been my folly.

Author: Julia Quinn,  Romancing Mister Bridgerton

Author: Leigh Bardugo,  Six of Crows

Author: Susane Colasanti,  When It Happens
Quote: Too bad guys aren’t like Mr. Potato Head Where you can pick and choose which parts you want. Then we might come up with a guy who meets your standards.- Maggie

Author: Richelle Mead,  Vampire Academy
Quote: But I couldn't help myself, couldn't help the way I felt as I recalled the bliss and rush of a vampire's bite.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Let us embrace each other like we have the arms of two chairs. Let us dance like our legs are those of a table. We should do dinner sometime.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My hands will get dirty holding your rose-shaped heart, because love is like gardening—it’s earthy and takes work to keep it alive.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I had a second friend come over to my house, and do you know what I called her? A refill. If relationships aren’t drinkable, why do we thirst for them so much?

Author: Louis C.K.
Quote: Shut up…let me tell you, LET ME. Every time I look at your face or even remember it, it wrecks me. And the way you are with me and you’re just fun and you shit all over me and you make fun of me and you’re real. I don’t have enough time in any day to think about you enough...I don’t even think about women anymore. I think about you.

Author: Nick Hornby
Quote: Sometimes you know you've got a chance with a girl because she wants to fight with you. If the world wasn't so messed up, it wouldn't be like that. If the world was normal, a girl being nice to you would be a good sign, but in the real world, it isn't.

Author: Milan Kundera,  The Unbearable Lightness of Being

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Deceiving others. That is what the world calls a romance.

Author: Janet Evanovich
Quote: Nice dress. Take it off.

Author: Colleen Houck,  Tiger's Curse

Author: Elizabeth Scott,  Perfect You

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Let’s be romantic and dance in the rain. I’ll prove my feelings for you by bringing an umbrella, because I’m drowning in my love for you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

It looked painful."Oh,"he said."Mr. Bradford?""Yes?""Would you mind it so very much if...you know...you proposed to me?"The light in Mr. Bradford's eyes jumped to life. He beamed so largely it almost wasn't crooked."If you want.

Author: Anna Nalick
Quote: But, my God, it's so beautiful when the boy smiles

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

I have no ground for the nonsensical vanity of fancying everybody who comes near me is in love with me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Author: Oscar Wilde

Author: Ai Yazawa,  Tenshi Nanka Ja Nai Kanzenban, Volume 1
Quote: His hands are saying that he wants to hold her. His feet are saying that he wants to chase after her... He's probably forgotten that I'm here, beside him

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

I'm your High Priestess and you've pledged yourself to me. That means you have my heart, too.""Then both of us better stay safe. A heart's a hard thing to live without. I should know. I've tried it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Author: Colleen Houck,  Tiger's Quest

You’ll have to live with my undying gratitude.

But this isn't like anything I've ever seen, or imagined, or even dreamed: this is like music or dancing but better than both.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Why aren’t red traffic lights heart-shaped? Probably because it’s not like rush hour can get any more romantic.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: He rose like heroes, and I rose like rows of red roses. Love grows wherever you plant it, so I try to farm it wherever I go.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I think I’m mouth blind and that’s why all food tastes bland. The only things that have any flavor are the words I love you.

Author: Shannon L. Alder

I would never date you. I hate you. I love you…..I think the madness started the moment we met and you shook my hand. Did you have a disease or something?

Author: Kristan Higgins,  My One and Only

Author: Rachel Caine,  Lord of Misrule
Quote: The door banged open, and Eve rushed out, flushed and mussed and still buttoning her shirt. 'It's not what you think,' she said. 'It was just—oh, okay, whatever, it was exactly what you think. Now, what?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Tennis is the only sport with love in the score, and that makes it the most romantic. I would be a player, but I wisely use the net to go fishing instead.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A circular table that spins around is a great way to make a romantic dinner for two with three people less awkward. I’ll pay for myself, I promise.

Author: Nora Roberts,  Black Hills
Quote: Do you know how many ways love can hit you? So it makes you happy, or miserable? It makes you sick in the belly or hurt in the heart. It makes everything brighter and sharper, or it blurs all the edges. It makes you feel like a king or a fool. Every way love can hit you, it's hit me when it comes to you

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: He’s as tall as a tree, but he fights like a rose bush. What’s with all the scratching? I should cut him down in the name of romance.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

Author: Rick Riordan,  The Mark of Athena

Author: Amanda Hocking,  Torn
Quote: I don't care where I come from or who you are. I can make you happy, and you make me happy. We could have a happily ever after.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I was gardening when I saw this snail/slug thing disguised as a leaf. Ah, isn't fall a wonderful time to slowly fall in love?

Author: E.L. James,  Fifty Shades of Grey
Quote: Of course. Silly me. Such a sad, exciting score, which no doubt you can play? So many accomplishments, Mr. Grey.”“And the greatest one is you, Miss Steele.

Author: Lauren Oliver,  Delirium
Quote: Find the things that matter, and hold on to them, and fight for them, and refuse to let them go.

Author: Jamie McGuire,  Beautiful Disaster

Quote: I hope I haven't given you the impression that I consider kissing intrinsically irrational.

Author: Julie Garwood,  Honor's Splendour
Quote: Madelyne, we're married now. 'Tis a usual occurrence to bed one's wife on the wedding night.

Author: Georgette Heyer,  Devil's Cub
Quote: You will like her,"he persisted. "Egad, she's after your own heart, maman! She shot me in the arm.""Voyons, do you think that is what I like?

Author: Faraaz Kazi
Quote: Lie beside me, oh my beloved! For thy thorns are more pleasurable than the petals of the world.Hold me in thy arms of hope, for the truth of separation can rest tonight.
